page.title: 15LIFE STYLE
page.content: In Church Road, at Crays Hill, we met an old man. He talked about the history of his house and those around him. His own house is semi_detached, rebuilt with brick in 1930, after the original ship_lap structure was blown down. Only one of the original houses which is fire damaged and derelict remains today. The other was burnt down. Some of the timbers from this house are being used for fire_wood. He has recently been connected to electricity but has no gas supply. He is not on mains_drainage,so has a cesspool in his garden.He likes the country,it provides all his needs; fruit from the hedgerows,vegetables from his garden and wines from plums and berries.The River Crouch floods his garden in rainy weather and is polluted from factories up_stream.
